name: Clean Z: Apocalypse before lunchtime
description:
International Educations Game Jam Game

Clean Up Windows and dodge zombies

Use the Wiper or spray for window cleaning
Use the Mop To get rid of zombies

Controls:
WASD - movement
Spacebar - item usage
123 - item selection

Programming:
Joakim Stenmark
Kellin Schaap
David van Rijn

Graphics:
Frida Karlsson
Nikay R
Calvin S
